title: Add some keywords in the "CREATE TABLE" in ORACLE.
body:
Fixes #6480.

Add some keywords in the "CREATE TABLE".
The keywords are below: PRIVATE SHARDED DUPLICATED SHARING METADATA DATA EXTENDED NONE MEMOPTIMIZE FOR PARENT.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- support for SQL “creating table” with keywords: sharing, optimize, parent.
- support for “SQL creating private” with keywords: temporary, shared, duplicated table.
-
